member.name: M:NFX.Web.EMail.MailerSink.SendMsg(NFX.Web.EMail.MailMsg)
member.summary: Performs actual sending of msg. This method does not have to be thread-safe as it is called by a single thread

member.summary: Faciliatets working with multipart encoding

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.Account
member.summary: Represents an account data vector that is - type of account identity (i.e. 'customer'), identity id (i.e. customer number '125') and account id within this identity (i.e. ref to customer #125 card '223322.....')

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Account.Identity
member.summary: For example 'customer' - name of table

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Account.IdentityID
member.summary: For example '125' - id of customer table row 125

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Account.AccountID
member.summary: Account id within identity id domain. For example '2' - id of method of payment for customer #125

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.AccountType
member.summary: Represents account type because some pay services (i.e. Stripe) requires this info

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.IActualAccountData
member.summary: Represents actual data for supplied account object. Data represented by this interface is ALWAYS TRANSITIVE in memory as some fields are either never stored permanently (i.e. CVC) or ciphered in the store (account number)

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystem
member.summary: Describes an entity that can perform pay functions (i.e. charge, transfer)

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystem.StartSession(NFX.Web.Pay.PayConnectionParameters)
member.summary: Starts new pay session of system-specific type. If cParams parameter is null is used

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystem.VerifyPotentialTransaction(NFX.Web.Pay.PaySession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,System.Boolean,NFX.Web.Pay.IActualAccountData,NFX.Web.Pay.IActualAccountData,NFX.Financial.Amount)

member.summary: Completely or partialy refunds previuosly charged funds

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.Mock.MockSystem
member.summary: Represents mock payment service (can be used for testing). Mock provider is driven by card pool configured in 'accounts" section (see sample config in ExternalCfg.LACONF)

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem
member.summary: Base class for IPaySystemImplementation implementation. Instances of descendants of this class is typically created and configured in PaySystemStarter class. Then particular pay system can be obtained from PaySystem.Instances[PAY_SYSTEM_NAME] indexer

member.name: T:NFX.Web.IWebClientCaller
member.summary: Stipulates contract for an entity that executes calls via WebClient

member.name: P:NFX.Web.IWebClientCaller.WebServiceCallTimeoutMs
member.summary: Specifies timeout for web call. If zero then default is used

member.name: P:NFX.Web.IWebClientCaller.KeepAlive
member.summary: Specifies keepalive option for web request

member.name: P:NFX.Web.IWebClientCaller.Pipelined
member.summary: Specifies if pipelining is used for web request

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.___SetPaySystemHost(NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystemHostImplementation)
member.summary: Sets process-global pay system host used to resolve accounts and transactions. If PayStarter is used then the host may be auto-injected from configuration if it is there. Developers: Do not call this method as it is used for dependency injection from system code

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.AutoStartSystems
member.summary: Automatically starts systems designated in config with auto-start attribute

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.StartSession(NFX.Web.Pay.PayConnectionParameters)
member.summary: Starts new pay session of system-specific type

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.ExternalParametersForGroups(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns named parameters that can be used to control this component

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.ExternalGetParameter(System.String,System.Object@,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets external parameter value returning true if parameter was found

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.ExternalSetParameter(System.String,System.Object,System.String[])
member.summary: Sets external parameter value returning true if parameter was found and set

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.PaySystemHost
member.summary: Returns process-global pay system host used to resolve accounts and transactions or throws if host is not set. Check IsPaySystemHost to see if host is set. This design provides an indirection level between pay systems (like Stripe, PayPal, Bank etc.) and particular application data store implementation as it decouples system-internal formats of transaction and account storage from provider-internal data (i.e. PayPal payment token string)

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.Instances
member.summary: Returns the read-only registry view of payment systems currently activated

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.InstrumentationEnabled
member.summary: Implements IInstrumentable

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystem.ExternalParameters
member.summary: Returns named parameters that can be used to control this component

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.Mock.PaymentMockException
member.summary: Represents stripe specific payment exception

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.PaymentException
member.summary: General NFX payment system specific exception

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystemHost
member.summary: Represents a process-global entity that resolves account handle into actual account data and fetches existing transactions. This design provides an indirection level between pay systems (like Stripe, PayPal, Bank etc.) and particular application data store implementation as it decouples system-internal formats of transaction and account storage from provider-internal data (i.e. PayPal payment token string). The instance of implementor is a singleton accessible via PaySystem.PaySystemHost

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystemHost.GenerateTransactionID(NFX.Web.Pay.PaySession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.TransactionType)
member.summary: Generates new transaction ID for desired pay session and transaction type (Charge, Transfer, Refund). Context supplies host specific information about this transation i.e. user id

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystemHost.FetchTransaction(NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a transaction with specified ID from storage or null

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystemHost.AccountToActualData(NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Account)
member.summary: Returns actual data for supplied account object

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.IPaySystemHostImplementation
member.summary: Denotes an implementation of IPaySystemHost

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext
member.summary: Denotes a context of transaction execution. Can be used to provide additional information

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.PaySystemStarter
member.summary: Represents a starter that launches payment systems on startup

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.PaymentStripeException
member.summary: Represents stripe specific payment exception

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.PaymentStripeException.Compose(System.Net.HttpWebResponse,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructs exception composing details from response, method specific error description and actual inner exception

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeCredentials
member.summary: Represents stripe credentials (test and publihsable keys)

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem
member.summary: Represents Stripe (see https://stripe.com) payment service. Some functions which implement IPaySystem interface don't use all supplied parameters

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.VerifyPotentialTransaction(NFX.Web.Pay.PaySession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,System.Boolean,NFX.Web.Pay.IActualAccountData,NFX.Web.Pay.IActualAccountData,NFX.Financial.Amount)
member.summary: The method is not implemented bacause there is no such function in Stripe

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.Charge(NFX.Web.Pay.PaySession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Financial.Amount,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Charges funds from credit card to current stripe account. Parameter "to" is unused in stripe provider.

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.Charge(NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Financial.Amount,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Overload of Charge method with Stripe-typed session parameter

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.Capture(NFX.Web.Pay.PaySession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction@,System.Nullable{NFX.Financial.Amount},System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Captures the payment of this, uncaptured, charge. This is the second half og the two-step payment flow, where first you created a charge with the capture option set to false. Uncaptured payment expires exactly seven days after it is created. If a payment is not captured by that pooint of time, it will be marked as refunded and will no longer be capturable. If set the amount of capture must be less than or equal to the original amount. Developers, don't call this method directly. Call Transaction.Capture instead.

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.Capture(NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction@,System.Nullable{NFX.Financial.Amount},System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Overload of Capture method with Stripe-typed session parameter

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.Refund(NFX.Web.Pay.PaySession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction@,System.Nullable{NFX.Financial.Amount},System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: If reason/description parameter set, possible values are duplicate, fraudulent, and requested_by_customer Developers, don't call this method directly. Call Transaction.Refund instead.

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.Refund(NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction@,System.Nullable{NFX.Financial.Amount},System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Overload of Refund method with Stripe-typed session parameter Developers, don't call this method directly. Call Transaction.Refund instead.

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.Transfer(NFX.Web.Pay.PaySession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Financial.Amount,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Transfers funds from current Stripe account to user account supplied in "to" parameter ("from" parameter is not used in Stripe implementation

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.transfer(NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,System.String,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Financial.Amount,System.String)
member.summary: Transfers funds to customerAccount from current stripe account (which credentials is supplied in current session)

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.createRecipient(NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSession,NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,System.String)
member.summary: Creates new recipient in Stripe system. Is used as a temporary entity to substitute recipient parameter in Transfer operation then deleted

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSystem.deleteRecipient(NFX.Web.Pay.Stripe.StripeSession,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes existing recipient in Stripe system. It is used to delete temporary recipient created to perform Transfer operation

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.TransactionType
member.summary: Denotes transaction types, such as: charges, refunds, transfers

member.name: F:NFX.Web.Pay.TransactionType.Charge
member.summary: Customer paid for some service (i.e. bought some product). Funds got withdrawn from customer account (i.e. credit card) into another account (i.e. system account)

member.name: F:NFX.Web.Pay.TransactionType.Refund
member.summary: The portion or the whole amount of the original charge has been refunded from system account into customer account (i.e. credit card). RelatedTransactionID points to the original charge transaction

member.name: F:NFX.Web.Pay.TransactionType.Transfer
member.summary: Funds were transfersed between accounts. This mode is usually used to transfer funds between system-internal accounts (i.e. from sales GL account to bank account)

member.name: T:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction
member.summary: Represents an abstraction of financial operation performed with pay system

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.Charge(System.Object,System.String,System.Object,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Financial.Amount,System.DateTime,System.String,System.Nullable{NFX.Financial.Amount},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates charge transaction
member.param: Payment processor name which this trasaction belongs to
Payment processor trasaction of this trasaction
Description of this transaction (e.g. "Payment for CPU Intel i7 4470 SandyBridge")
Captured amount (can be less or equals to amount)
Can be this trasaction be captured at all
Can be this trasaction be refunded at all

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.Transfer(System.Object,System.String,System.Object,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Web.Pay.Account,NFX.Financial.Amount,System.DateTime,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates transfer transaction
member.param: Payment processor name which this trasaction belongs to
Payment processor trasaction of this trasaction
Description of this transaction (e.g. "Payment for CPU Intel i7 4470 SandyBridge")

member.summary: Framework-only method. Developer shouldn't call it.
member.param: Payment processor name which this trasaction belongs to
Payment processor trasaction of this trasaction
Description of this transaction (e.g. "Payment for CPU Intel i7 4470 SandyBridge")
Captured amount (can be less or equals to amount)
Can be this trasaction be captured at all
Refunded amount (can be less or equals to amount)
Can be this trasaction be refunded at all
ID of trasaction which this transaction belongs to (e.g. refund transaction refers to its charge trasaction)

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.Capture(NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,System.Nullable{NFX.Financial.Amount},System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Performs Capture operation on this transaction if possible. If an error occured PaymentException (or inherited) is thrown. Developers! Don't call PaySystem.Capture directly - always use this method instead

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.Refund(NFX.Web.Pay.ITransactionContext,System.Nullable{NFX.Financial.Amount},System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Performs Refund operation on this transaction if possible. If an error occured PaymentException (or inherited) is thrown. Developers! Don't call PaySystem.Refund directly - always use this method instead

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.ID
member.summary: Unique ID for this transaction instance

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.ProcessorName
member.summary: The name of pay system implementation system that processes this transaction

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.ProcessorToken
member.summary: A value assigned by a particular pay system implementation. This value is parsed and understood by issuing system

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.CreateDateUTC
member.summary: UTC timestamp of this transaction creation

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.Description
member.summary: Textual transaction description

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.Amount
member.summary: Transaction amount - monetary value and currency code. Depending on the transaction type can indicate charged amount, refunded amount, transfer amount

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.AmountCaptured
member.summary: Charged amount - monetary value and currency code. For charge indicates captured amount in two-step charge scenario. Returns zero for uncaptured charges (created with captured flag set to false). Returns non-zero amount (typically is equal to original charge amount) for captured amount. Returns zero for all other transaction types

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.CanCapture
member.summary: If this transaction can be captured by value less or equal to its initial amount

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.AmountRefunded
member.summary: Transaction amount - monetary value and currency code. Indicates refunded amount for charge transaction. Can be reflected in child refund transactions when explicit refund performed or can be just reminder of partial capture. For transactions types other than charge returns zero

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.CanRefund
member.summary: If this transaction can be refunded by value less or equal to its initial amount

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.ParentTransactionID
member.summary: ID of transaction that this trasaction relates/belongs to e.g. charge transaction ID for this refund transaction

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.ExtraData
member.summary: Contains additional data

member.name: P:NFX.Web.Pay.Transaction.LeftToRefund
member.summary: Returns amount that can be refunded. It is calculated as 'this transaction amount' - 'summary amount of all child refund transactions (if present)'

member.name: T:NFX.Web.GeoLookup.GeoLookupService
member.summary: Represents a service that can lookup country/city names by domainnames/ip addresses. Thehis implementatuion uses free data from: http://dev.maxmind.com/geoip/geoip2/geolite2/. Must include MaxMind attribution on the public site that uses this data (see License section on maxmind.com)

member.summary: Describes an entity that can perform social functions (i.e. login, post)

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.GetExternalLoginReference(System.String)
member.summary: Returns href to login via social system/site

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.GetSpecifiedExternalLoginReference(NFX.Web.Social.SocialUserInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Returns social service login URL for "two-stage" login networks. Currently twitter only requires this
member.param: Social site redirects browser here after login

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.ObtainTokensAndFillInfo(NFX.Web.Social.SocialUserInfo,NFX.Serialization.JSON.JSONDataMap,System.String)
member.summary: Fills user info with values from social network
member.param: Social network login URL (sometimes needed by social site just to ensure correct call)

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.RenewLongTermTokens(NFX.Web.Social.SocialUserInfo)
member.summary: Refreshes long term tokens (if provider needs them). Should be used in scenario like background server-side token renew routine

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.RetrieveUserInfo(NFX.Web.Social.SocialUserInfo)
member.summary: Retrieves all user fields (e.g. screen name, email) but tokens.

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.CreateSocialUserInfo(System.Nullable{NFX.Web.Social.SocialUserInfoToken})
member.summary: Create an instance of social user info class. If parameters are null then creates new non-logged-in instance, otherwise, if parameters are set, then connects to network and tries to re-initializes SocialUser info with fresh data from the network (i.e. name, gender etc.) using the supplied net tokens, or throws if tokens are invalid (i.e. expired). This returned instance is usually stored in session for later use

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.GetPictureData(NFX.Web.Social.SocialUserInfo,System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Returns user profile image data along with content type or null if no image available. Picture kind specifies classification of pictures within profile i.e. "main", "small-icon" etc.

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.GetPicture(NFX.Web.Social.SocialUserInfo,System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Returns user profile image or null if no image available. Picture kind specifies classification of pictures within profile i.e. "main", "small-icon" etc.

member.name: M:NFX.Web.Social.ISocialNetwork.PostMessage(NFX.Web.Social.SocialUserInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Post message to social network

member.summary: Globally uniquelly identifies social network architype

member.summary: Pseudo-field (no social network has this field. It's composed from other fields in specific way for each network.
